entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine AppOfflineDroppedWhileSiteStarting_SiteShutsDown_InProcess #60482
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/8.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #60478
  • Quarantine Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.RevalidatingServerAuthenticationStateProviderTest.SuppliesCancellationTokenThatSignalsWhenRevalidationLoopIsBeingDiscarded #60472
  • Polymorphic derived types do not have discriminator property marked as required in OpenAPI schema. #60469
  • Update OpenTelemetry semantic conventions to include AuthN/AuthZ metrics #60468
  • Add authentication failure reason to AuthN metrics #60467
  • XML doc generation support should resovle inheritdoc in additional files #60466
    Backlog
  • Generate OpenAPI documents at build-time ignores configured customisations #60463
  • First class http patch support #60462
  • [Blazor] WebAssembly package version missmatch with SDK/RuntimePack version #60461
    .NET 10 Planning
  • openapi with newtonsoft.json suppport generate incorrect request/response model schema #60458
  • dotnet dev-certs https --check Shows Certificate Invalid on macOS #60474
  • PackageOverrides.txt in targeting pack should list Microsoft.AspNetCore.App #60456

Closed

  • Add IsLocalUrl Support For Endpoint Method #24486
    Backlog
  • Make blazor.server.js compatible with strict CSS CSP #58629
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [Blazor] Enable custom text in the new (.Net 9.0) reconnect dialog #57453
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot #60378
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #60377
  • Published size regression: basicminimalapipublishaot #60364
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, todosapipublishaot #60349
  • .NET 9 OpenAPI not working with nullable property with MaxLengthAttribute #59428
  • [Blazor] NavigationManager is no longer resolvable outside Razor pages. #60454
  • [SignalR] NullReferenceException in SignalR.ClientProxyExtensions.SendAsync #60449
  • OpenIdConnectProtocolException: IDX21314: OpenIdConnectProtocol requires the jwt token to have an 'aud' claim. #57938
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Routes not work in blazor #60409

PullRequests

Created

  • Quarantine SuppliesCancellationTokenThatSignalsWhenRevalidationLoopIs… #60473
    area-blazor
  • Fix handling for more method signature types #60464
    area-mvc
  • view-data-* attribute for partial tag helper #60459
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix installer package versioning #60457
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview2
  • Increase Grpc InteropTests timeout #60471
    area-grpc, 10.0-preview2
  • Revert "Update branding to preview3" #60470
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview2
  • Fix: OpenAPI Schema Handling For Nullable Collection Types #60460
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 10.0-preview2
  • Add reconnect UI component to the Blazor template #60376
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview2

Updated

  • Avoid IISHttpServer close race on construction #60399
    area-networking
  • Enhance Lockout Functionality: Add Test for AccessFailedAsync Incrementing Count #60350
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Abstract away the TestServer dependency from WebApplicationBuilder #60247
    area-networking
  • Add Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi to the webapiaot template (with an optional flag to disable it) #60337
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.2.25117.1 #60451
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Scroll in enhanced navigation behaves same as in client side routing #60296
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-enhanced-navigation
  • Simplify PublicTopLevelProgramGenerator #60222
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
